title: Integrated Social-Emotional Learning (SEL) and Restorative Justice (RJ) Education: Experiential Workshop for Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics teaching experience and foundational classroom conflict management concepts
context.additional_context: In-service math teachers explore SEL-RJ integrated strategy applications while experiencing real classroom simulations

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate resolving conflicts that occur during math classes through restorative justice (RJ) procedures via VR simulation.

Learners can propose lesson design plans incorporating the five core competencies of social-emotional learning (SEL): self-awareness, self-management, social awareness, relationship skills, and responsible decision-making.
Learners can develop an integrated SEL-RJ assessment rubric and apply it to project-based evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
